full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** CCGS Martha L. Black Drydock 22-23
**Contract Reference:** PW-__MD-041-28862
**Publication Date:** November 25, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a supplier to provide Drydock services for the CCGS Martha L. Black for the 2022-2023 fiscal year.

**Scope of Work:**
The contract requires the supplier to perform Drydock work on the CCGS Martha L. Black in accordance with the Statement of Work (SOW) and all associated technical information provided. The scope of work includes carrying out unscheduled work authorized by PWGSC during the contract period.

**Contract Period:**
The contract period is from June 2023 to June 2024.

**Trade Agreement:**
This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Indigenous Participation Component:**
This procurement includes a mandatory Indigenous Participation Component (IPC) under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business program.

**Bidding Conditions:**
All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest bid price that meets all mandatory requirements.

**Additional Information:**
- Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
- The contract retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- The Crown may request additional information from suppliers during the procurement process.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Mastaneh Pourmand, Trade Agreement Commissioned Officer (TACO), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at (343) 543-2874 or [mastaneh.pourmand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mastaneh.pourmand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). [mastaneh.pourmand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mastaneh.pourmand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Attachments
